articles.author: Susannah Savage
articles.title: Moscow kills off Black Sea grain deal - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Kremlin claims Russia’s conditions have not been fulfilled.
articles.content:
The Kremlin said on Monday that a U.N.-brokered deal to allow the safe passage of Ukrainian grain exports through the Black Sea is terminated, claiming that Russia's conditions had not been met.

articles.author: Philip Blenkinsop
articles.title: EU seeks to revive Latin America, Caribbean ties as it turns away from China, Russia - Reuters
articles.description: Over 50 leaders from the European Union, Latin America and the Caribbean will hold their first summit in eight years on Monday, adding momentum to an EU push for new political and economic allies prompted by the Ukraine war and suspicion of China.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, July 17 (Reuters) - Over 50 leaders from the European Union, Latin America and the Caribbean will hold their first summit in eight years on Monday, adding momentum to an EU push for new pol… [+2930 chars]
